teaser: This week: indie-folk duo The Watson Twins shares their secret fantasy…A short history of John Dillinger… How to mix an Old-Fashioned cocktail… Taste a hot sauce 8 times more potent than pepper spray.

title: Episode 1: The Watson Twins, Dillinger, Hot Sauce
